contribution_desc: A lightweight, flexible, shape-variable and robust display solution. Spatially aware handheld lenses and interaction techniques for the spatial exploration of virtual information spaces in the real-world space above a tabletop. The paper also presents four basic types of explorable data spaces: the volumetric, layered, zoomable, and temporal information space.
tracking_characteristic: Outside-in tracking; Multiple screens; Location 3D; Orientation; Identity
